body_html:
If the value of keep_prob placeholder is 1, dropout should return directly. But the current code will not.
For inference, it is reasonable to set keep_prob to 1 to skip dropout op. The current code cannot skip dropout.

body:
If the value of keep_prob placeholder is 1, dropout should return directly. But the current code will not. 
For inference, it is reasonable to set keep_prob to 1 to skip dropout op. The current code cannot skip dropout.
